message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I believe would be highly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm willing to pay for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could come down to $1,275,000.  This offer reflects the  product's worth while acknowledging your interest.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,225,000. This is my final offer, but I'm open to discussing further if you're willing to come down a bit more.
